Docs.param: Random seed. Set to null for a non-deterministic environment.
Set to true for fully verbose logging.
Concurrency level. Set to 1 to run single-threaded. Set to 0 to pick automatically.
Text writer to print normal messages to.
Text writer to print error messages to.
Docs.summary: Create an ML.NET for local execution, with console feedback.

Docs.summary: Pull running calculations for their progress and output all messages to the console. If no messages are available, print a dot. If a specified number of dots are printed, print an ad-hoc status of all running calculations.
